00028     ngl::Random *randObj = ngl::Random::instance();
00029     static int i = 25; // a hack kind of logic to make sure that the objects are not too close to each other
00030     i = -i;
00031     ngl::Vec3 pos = ngl::Vec3(randObj->getRandomPoint(this->m_pos.m_x + (randObj->randomPositiveNumber(2) * 30),0,this->m_pos.m_z + 100));
00032     pos.m_z += i;
00033     if (abs(this->m_pos.m_z - pos.m_z) < 5)
00034     {
00035         pos.m_z += (i * 2);
00036     }
00037
